name: Beavis and Butt-Head: Bunghole in One
name_original: Beavis and Butt-Head: Bunghole in One
description:
Beavis and Butt-Head: Bunghole in One is a game.
You can play Beavis and Butt-Head: Bunghole in One on PC.
It was produced by John Andrews, Michael Blakey, Rhonda Cox and Susie Lewis. It was directed by Mike Judge and Yvette Kaplan. It was scored by Mike Judge.
